channel.title: Philosopher Isles Return - Also My Return
channel.description:
[center][size=10pt]Philosopher Isle The Return[/size][/center]
As many of you know I started getting really in active in this community because I was planned on just playing around with these two servers I always talked to my friends on. But now I'm back and ready to get a job done. I have a brand new computer meaning anytime you message me I'll get it. Anytime you need me I may be there. I want this to prove to everyone that Philosopher Isle can have its good features and it's bad. Atm it's like the old one but theres new portals and new places.
Index: Section 1:Philosopher Isle Goals Section 2:Philosopher Isle Rules Section 3:Philosopher Isle Completions Section 4:Inconclusion Section 5:Open Spots/Applicants
Section 1: Philosopher Isle Goals My goals are as following
[ul][li]A Stable Community[/li] [li]Some working GFX's[/li] [li]Working Mini Games (Trade point/item for reward)[/li] [li]Getting all skills to be of some importance[/li] [li]Stable Pking[/li] [li]Perfect 1 vs 1 (Mines bit buggy when you try to attack someone sometimes it works)[/li] [li]Magic On Npcs[/li] [li]Teleporting by talking to npcs[/li] [li]Perfect Npc Defense[/li] [li]Other[/li][/ul]
Section 2:Philosopher Isle Rules
[ul][li]This Time I Will Not Put Up With Any Negitive Comments[/li] [li]This Time You Must Be Active[/li] [li]This Time You Must Get Your Job Done In Reasonable Time[/li] [li]This Time You Must Have A Messenger Of Some Type[/li] [li]Don't Ask For Copies Of The Server - Sometimes you'll need certain portions like client.java ect.[/li] [li]No Critisizing[/li] [li]Deal With In Appropriate Activity[/li] [li]Know What Your Doing, If You Don't Then Ask For Questions[/li][/ul]
Section 3:Philosopher Isle Completions
[ul][li]New Portals![/li] [li]1 vs 1 Combat Working![/li] [li]Defense Working![/li] [li]Cooking,Fishing,Fletching,Mining,Smithing,Herbalore, and some others working![/li] [li]Auto Attacking Npcs![/li] [li]Community Based on drops [Still need to get this going. I rushed earlier][/li] [li]Simple Barrows [Need Full][/li] [li]Most Weapons Have Spiecals[/li] [li]Working Vengence and Working Scull[/li] [li]A little Less Lagg[/li][/ul]
Section 4:Inconclusion Now please do not spam, I have a decent goal here and that is just for a enjoyable server. Until the few people that I know have the up-to-date servers and clients release them all I want to do is make some fun of these servers. I want everyone to make sure they want to apply before they really do apply.
Section 5:Open Spots/Applicants [Partner In Server Work] - [Open] [Client Worker] - [Open] [Backup Hoster] - [Open] (Incase my router stops working I'll trust you with the class files to run it.) [Forum Moderators] - [Open - [Open] [In-Game Moderator] - [Open] [Forums Worker] - [Open]
[b]Pending Applicants:0 Accepted Applicants:1 hockey4lifexx Declined Apllicants:1 AndyNerd - Sorry but the occupation you wish to be in doesn't seem correct.
Apllication:[/b] [code][b]Occupation:[/b] [b]Age:[/b] [b]Are you mature enough to take this task?:[/b] [b]Messenger:[/b] [b]Are you active?:[/b] [b]Do you agree to be active every day - 2 unless excused?:[/b] [b]Can you host on a restarter if I can't?:[/b] [/code]
I don't care about experience because I'm not great in experience anyways.
Will add pics/vids later maybe.

Age: 14
Are you mature enough to take this task?: yes
Messenger: aim: hockey4lifexx, i can get a msn if u need
Are you active?: yes
Do you agree to be active every day - 2 unless excused?: yes
Can you host on a restarter if I can’t?: well i really wouldnt want to but i can[/quote]

You are accepted as a moderator for both. Make sure you have time seeing as you may be in more than one project.

Above,
Hi dd, i think I might know you.

Are you active?: oh ya loads of free time!
Do you agree to be active every day - 2 unless excused?:yup fine with me
Can you host on a restarter if I can’t?:nope sorry i can only backup files for you

if you want i can be a website/forum worker i can advertise i can do pretty much anything ya need i am an odd job jack when i comes to computers like i could do anything from testing the server and clients to finding sources for you!

item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

[center][size=10pt]Philosopher Isle The Return[/size][/center]

    As many of you know I started getting really in active in this community because I was planned on just playing around with these two servers I always talked to my friends on. But now I'm back and ready to get a job done. I have a brand new computer meaning anytime you message me I'll get it. Anytime you need me I may be there. I want this to prove to everyone that Philosopher Isle can have its good features and it's bad. Atm it's like the old one but theres new portals and new places.

Index:
Section 1:Philosopher Isle Goals
Section 2:Philosopher Isle Rules
Section 3:Philosopher Isle Completions
Section 4:Inconclusion
Section 5:Open Spots/Applicants

Section 1: Philosopher Isle Goals
My goals are as following

[ul][li]A Stable Community[/li]
[li]Some working GFX’s[/li]
[li]Working Mini Games (Trade point/item for reward)[/li]
[li]Getting all skills to be of some importance[/li]
[li]Stable Pking[/li]
[li]Perfect 1 vs 1 (Mines bit buggy when you try to attack someone sometimes it works)[/li]
[li]Magic On Npcs[/li]
[li]Teleporting by talking to npcs[/li]
[li]Perfect Npc Defense[/li]
[li]Other[/li][/ul]

Section 2:Philosopher Isle Rules

[ul][li]This Time I Will Not Put Up With Any Negitive Comments[/li]
[li]This Time You Must Be Active[/li]
[li]This Time You Must Get Your Job Done In Reasonable Time[/li]
[li]This Time You Must Have A Messenger Of Some Type[/li]
[li]Don’t Ask For Copies Of The Server - Sometimes you’ll need certain portions like client.java ect.[/li]
[li]No Critisizing[/li]
[li]Deal With In Appropriate Activity[/li]
[li]Know What Your Doing, If You Don’t Then Ask For Questions[/li][/ul]

Section 3:Philosopher Isle Completions

[ul][li]New Portals![/li]
[li]1 vs 1 Combat Working![/li]
[li]Defense Working![/li]
[li]Cooking,Fishing,Fletching,Mining,Smithing,Herbalore, and some others working![/li]
[li]Auto Attacking Npcs![/li]
[li]Community Based on drops [Still need to get this going. I rushed earlier][/li]
[li]Simple Barrows [Need Full][/li]
[li]Most Weapons Have Spiecals[/li]
[li]Working Vengence and Working Scull[/li]
[li]A little Less Lagg[/li][/ul]

Section 4:Inconclusion
Now please do not spam, I have a decent goal here and that is just for a enjoyable server. Until the few people that I know have the up-to-date servers and clients release them all I want to do is make some fun of these servers. I want everyone to make sure they want to apply before they really do apply.

Section 5:Open Spots/Applicants
